Package gw.api.observability

  • Class
    Description
    DataDogReporter
    DataDogReporter is an implementation of the ObservabilityReporter interface which does two things:
    DataDogReporter.EndEnum
     
    MarkerConfig
    A set of marker configurations for use with ObservabilityPlugin.configureMarkerDefaults(java.lang.String, gw.api.observability.MarkerConfig).
    ObservabilityContext
    A set of configurations specific to a single usage of ObservabilityPlugin to communicate what the plugin should include in any log messages or metrics it sends.
    ObservabilityHandler
    This is a higher-order class designed to make the typical ObservabilityPlugin usage as painless and robust as possible.
    ObservabilityHandler.Builder
     
    ObservabilityLogger
    Reports start and endings of business events.
    ObservabilityReporter
     
    ServiceCheckStatus
    Copied essentially 1:1 from the com.timgroup.statsd.ServiceCheck.Status enum, for use with the ObservabilityReporter API.
